text: Wilfred Chisholm (23 May 1921 – 1962) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1962 deaths Category:People from Hebburn Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Newcastle United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Spennymoor United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Wilf Chisholm
